title: 01: CSAs, water buffalo, seed politics and a chicken speak-easy
subtitle: 01: CSAs, water buffalo, seed politics and a chicken speak-easy
summary: Farmerama Radio shares great stories from the smaller scale farming movement in the UK. We are out in the field digging out what's really going on. In Episode one we went to the annual CSA gathering to learn the ins and outs of community supported agriculture, Nigel visits a Devon Water buffalo farm and Zarah Rahman investigates the historical significance of seeds.
